Thief.Description: A Roublard have the ability to kill other player by attaking the blind spot

Paladin.Description: A paladin have the job to tank for other character

Wise.Description: A Wase have the ability to use magic power to hit character in huge zone

Monk.Description: A Monk have the ability to use this hand to hit his ennemy

Druid.Description: A Druide know how to use the forest to take advantage against his ennemy

Warrior.Description: A Warrior fight barehand for merit and money
